title: A2A Task
description: Task is the core unit of action for A2A (A2A Specification Section 4.1.1).
notes: This schema is a 1:1 copy of A2A Protocol's Task object structure. ADCP uses this for webhook payloads and fully adopts A2A's structure.

id.description: Unique identifier (e.g. UUID) for the task, generated by the server for a new task.

contextId.description: Unique identifier (e.g. UUID) for the contextual collection of interactions (tasks and messages). Created by the A2A server.

status.description: The current status of a Task, including state and a message.

artifacts.description: A set of output artifacts for a Task.

history.description: The history of interactions from a task.

metadata.description: A key/value object to store custom metadata about a task.
